title: Homepage | Richard Dawkins Foundation for Reason and Science
snippet: From the Richard Dawkins Foundation Newsletter. Subscribe here. Hello! Believe it or not, we’re less than two months away from the start of the Scopes Trial Centennial conference in Chattanooga, Tennessee. Richard Dawkins will be there in person, and I hope some of you will be as well.

title: Aug 16, 2025 | Richard Dawkins Foundation for Reason and Science
snippet: From the Richard Dawkins Foundation Newsletter. Subscribe here. Hello! As you know, 2025 marks the 100th anniversary of the Scopes Monkey Trial. It’s also the twenty-year anniversary of the landmark Kitzmiller v. Dover trial.

title: ‘The Outrageous Act of Teaching Evolution’ | Richard Dawkins Foundation for Reason and Science
snippet: I’m very pleased that Richard Dawkins will be joining us in Chattanooga and presenting the 2025 Richard Dawkins Award to linguistics professor and courageous truth-speaker John McWhorter as part of the weekend’s activities.
